price: 你们当服从安拉，当服从使者。如果你们违背命令，那么，我的使者，只负明白的通知的责任。
arabic: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla fa-in tawallaytum fa-innamā ʿalā rasūlinā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
